parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To put under, lay down, suggest to, put in mind. From hupo and tithemi; to place underneath, i.e. to hazard, to suggest.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural

str2: The neck. Probably from trecho; the throat, i.e. life.
Gen: in behalf of; acc: above.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
Only, solitary, desolate. Probably from meno; remaining, i.e. Sole or single; by implication, mere.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a compound of ek and a derivative of kaleo; a calling out, i.e. a popular meeting, especially a religious congregation.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably from etho; a race, i.e. A tribe; specially, a foreign one.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: From eucharistos; to be grateful, i.e. to express gratitude; specially, to say grace at a meal.
